description: From Middle English savely; equivalent to safe +â€Ž -ly.

adverbs.description: safely (comparative safelier or more safely, superlative safeliest or most safely)

entries.meaning: In a safe manner; without risk; using caution above all else.
In a secure manner; without the possibility of injury or harm resulting.
examples: It had been agreed that they should all meet in the big barn as soon as Mr. Jones was safely out of the way.
